SEARCH
Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class Notation

java.lang.Object
org.wmn4j.notation.Notation
public final class Notation extends Object
Represents a connected notation that spans across multiple notes, such as ties, slurs, or arpeggiation. The connected notations are represented using connections between adjacent notes. For example, if three notes are affected by the same slur, the first will be connected to the second note and the second note will be connected to the third note. The connections should follow the left to right order in the score (i.e. connections go from left to right). For chords the connections should got from lowest note to highest (e.g., beginning of arpeggiation is the lowest note of the chord).

This class is immutable.

    static enum

    The style used in the connected notation.
